modeltools R package

Tools for building COVID-19 statistical models, with an emphasis on short-term forecasting and hotspot prediction. This package is meant to be used in conjunction with the covidcast and evalcast R packages that are also developed and maintained by the Delphi research group headquartered at Carnegie Mellon University.

To get started using this package, see the Getting Started guide.

Get updates

You should consider subscribing to the API mailing list to be notified of package updates, new data sources, corrections, and other updates.

Usage

Warning: This package is not on CRAN! An R package named modeltools does exist on CRAN, but it is entirely unrelated to this one. For our package, please follow the installation instructions in the Getting Started guide.

Links

Browse source code at:
https://github.com/cmu-delphi/covidcast/tree/main/R-packages/modeltools

Report a bug at:
https://github.com/cmu-delphi/covidcast/issues

Get the covidcast R package:
https://cmu-delphi.github.io/covidcast/covidcastR

Get the evalcast R package:
https://cmu-delphi.github.io/covidcast/evalcastR
